name: indent.js
tagline: Fast minimalistic pure indentation of JavaScript, CSS, and HTML.
body:
### A code indenter built to only indent code while preserving everything else.
This tool will not re-space your code, output proper js-lint compatible code (like forcing object properties to be on separate lines). It works with any combination of CSS, JavaScript, HTML, and perhaps even several other languages.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
